::Zardus/Ramulus::

Zardus frowns. Last he had known of Megatron, his signature was lost in a 
swamp.

"I serioustly doubt Megatron can do that much harm. I've delt with him 
before, many times. But if you preffer inside, very well."

Zardus walks into the Alliance base, motioning for Starscream to follow. 
Zardus didn't trust the bot, so the scanners were watching him carefully.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus clenches his teeth as hard as he could as the began decent, grabbing 
his seat tightly. He felt like all his parts wanted to jump up out of his 
head.

His eyes widen as he hears Brix tell him to put the fire out, the ram 
gulping. Slowly, he forces his hands to release the grip on the chair, 
undoing the seatbelt and getting shakily to his feet. Slowly, forcing himself 
to take steps, he walks over to the fire extinguisher type device, grabbing 
it off the wall and going to work on the flames, trying not to think of the 
fact that they were a very long distance up, with the back of the shuttle on 
fire.
